Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

How do i register for an account with Xn: How do i register for an account with Xnet Trading ?
Click on the Register link or button on: Click on the Register link or button on the very top of the page. Fill out the required forms with a valid email address and once you have completed the form your account is ready for use. Please make sure you have a valid phone number and email address on file.
What Crypto Currencies Can i buy and sel: What Crypto Currencies Can i buy and sell on Xnet ?
You can buy and sell the following. Bitc: You can buy and sell the following. Bitcoin, Lite coin and ETH, But we recommend that you only use Bitcoin for trading because it has more value.
Click on Contact Us on the very top of y: Click on Contact Us on the very top of your home page or at the very bottom of your home page. You can fill out the form and wait for a response within 24-48 hours or you can contact us by phone or email for a faster response.
Should i cancel a trade if the trader sa: Should i cancel a trade if the trader says to do so ?
Remember. Never send your payment inform: Remember. Never send your payment information to a trader without the trader accepting your offer first. If the trader accepts your offer and request that you submit payment information once you have submitted that information the trader must process the payment and release your bitcoins to your Xnet Wallet. If the trader says never mind you can cancel the trade and you have submitted payment already. Do not cancel trade. First check your gift card or payment to make sure it wasnt reedemed if your balance still remains untouched you can cancel your trade. If your payment was reedemed and trader refuses to release payment please open a dispute immediately or contact support@xnettrading.com with your account email, name, and a detailed message of your problem.

My account was closed How do i receive r: My account was closed How do i receive remaining balance ?
If your account was closed all remaining: If your account was closed all remaining balance will be accesbile for withdraw. If your having problems withdrawing your funds please contact support@XnetTrading.com with the subject : Cant Withdraw and our support team will assist you immediately.
Do Xnet charge a fee for trading ?: Do Xnet charge a fee for trading ?
Yes. Theres a fee for every trade. Diffe: Yes. Theres a fee for every trade. Different fees for different trade amounts. for example $5,000 trade fee is $30.00
Someone is harrasing me or trying to rip: Someone is harrasing me or trying to rip me off ?
We do not accept negative behaviors on o: We do not accept negative behaviors on our platform. Users will be suspended or removed for harrasment, Threats or Fraud. Suspensions can last up to 30 days. After 3 suspensions your account will be removed permanently.
How do i create a offer ?: How do i create a offer ?
You must first sign in to your account. Look for offers on the menu section and follow the steps easy as 123. If your having problems creating new offers please contact support.
How do i dispute a trade ?: How do i dispute a trade ?
When you open a trade wait for the timer: When you open a trade wait for the timer to complete once the timer has complete the trader is unresponsive you may start a dispute by selecting the option ''DISPUTE''
Do you share my information with third p: Do you share my information with third parties ?
No. Not even law enforcement unless your: No. Not even law enforcement unless your a murderer on the run or a court order has been issued by an official court magistrate or federal government official with a valid warrant offical document signed off by a valid judge. Other than that we do not share our clients information with other companies and etc;.
No not with anyone unless a court order: No not with anyone unless a court order has been issued by an official court magistrate or the federal government with a valid warrant offical document signed off by a valid judge. Besides that we do not share any XNET users personal information such as login details, Ip address or wallet information or any other sensitive information with other persons or companies.  Any Warrant documents forwarded to our office will be forwarded to our attorney's office for clearance. We do not play with customer's information or wallets. We take your privacy and personal information very serious. Even staff members at Xnet Trading are disabled from entering any account without admin's consent or user's consent. All moderators can do is Resolve a dispute or escalate your request to escalation's for further support.
Do you charge fees for deposit ?: Do you charge fees for deposit ?
No. But the bitcoin network does and we: No. But the bitcoin network does and we have no control over that.
